content.text: Hi, I'm doing well, how about you?
I'm doing good too, thanks. I love the weather in Portland, it's so mild.
Yeah, I love it too! It's perfect for hiking and outdoor activities.
I agree! I actually fell and sprained my ankle while hiking last year.
Oh no! That sounds painful. I'm glad you're okay.
Thanks, me too. I'm just glad I was able to finish the hike.
That's great! I'm sure it was a beautiful hike.
It was! It was in the Columbia River Gorge.
Oh, I love that area! I've hiked there a few times.
Yeah, it's so beautiful. I love the waterfalls.
I'm glad we had this conversation. It reminded me of one of my favorite hikes.
Me too! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a good night.
